about.heroSubtitle: GoMonto connects vehicle owners to renters throughout UEMOA, with a simple, secure platform adapted to African realities.
about.historyP1: GoMonto was born from a simple observation: in West Africa, renting a vehicle remains complicated, opaque, and often expensive. Major international brands only cover capital city airports, leaving most travelers and professionals without a suitable solution.
about.historyP2: In 2023, Inopay Group, an Ivorian company specializing in digital solutions for Africa, launched GoMonto with a clear mission: democratize access to mobility throughout UEMOA.
about.historyP3: Our platform allows anyone to offer their vehicle for rent, while providing renters with a modern booking experience with integrated Mobile Money payments (MTN MoMo, Orange Money, Wave, Moov).
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide each of our decisions.
about.trustDesc: We verify every owner and every vehicle to ensure a secure experience.
about.innovationDesc: We use the best technologies to simplify vehicle rental in Africa.
about.communityDesc: We build a network of trust between owners and renters throughout UEMOA.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in every interaction, every transaction, every experience.
about.presenceSubtitle: GoMonto is available in all 8 UEMOA countries.
about.platformEditorText: GoMonto is published by Inopay Group, a company under Ivorian law.
about.ctaSubtitle: Whether you're a renter looking for the perfect vehicle or an owner wanting to monetize your vehicle, GoMonto is made for you.

contact.heroSubtitle: Our team is available to answer all your questions.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messageSentDesc: We will respond as soon as possible.

howItWorks.heroSubtitle: A platform designed for West Africa. Rent or list a vehicle in a few clicks, with integrated Mobile Money payments.

step1.title: Search
step1.description: Browse our catalog of verified vehicles throughout UEMOA. Filter by city, vehicle type or budget.

step2.title: Book
step2.description: Select your dates and send a booking request. The owner will receive an instant notification.

step3.title: Pay the deposit
step3.description: Secure your booking by paying the deposit via Mobile Money (MTN MoMo, Orange Money, Wave, Moov).

step4.title: Pick up the vehicle
step4.description: Meet the owner, sign the digital contract and get the keys. The balance is paid at this time.

howItWorks.forRentersSubtitle: Find the perfect vehicle for your trips, vacations or events.
howItWorks.verifiedVehiclesDesc: Every vehicle is inspected. Owners go through a rigorous KYC process.
howItWorks.securePaymentDesc: Pay directly to the owner via Mobile Money. Your deposit secures the booking.
howItWorks.authenticReviewsDesc: Read evaluations from other renters to choose with confidence.
howItWorks.forOwnersSubtitle: Monetize your vehicle by listing it for rent on GoMonto.
howItWorks.uemoaVisibilityDesc: Your vehicle is visible to thousands of potential renters in 8 countries.
howItWorks.qualifiedBookingsDesc: Only receive serious requests. The deposit filters reliable renters.
howItWorks.simplifiedManagementDesc: Calendar, digital contracts, integrated payments. Everything is managed from your dashboard.
howItWorks.trustPlatformDesc: GoMonto verifies every owner and every vehicle. Payments are made directly between parties through secure means. We facilitate the connection, you keep control.
